to offer a sacrifice to (gods or ancestors)/memorial ceremony/(in classical novels) to recite an incantation to activate a magic weapon/(lit. and fig.) to wield

sentences.english: Xiao Cai sheds light on the realities of pricing at Guanghua Market.
sentences.chinese: 小蔡一语道破光华商家的订价策略。

sentences.english: Thank God that our Sis. Chuah had recovery from her surgery.
sentences.chinese: 感谢神，我们的蔡姐妹已从手术后康复。

sentences.english: Besieged between the state of Chen and Cai, Confucius and his disciples had not cooked for seven days.
sentences.chinese: 孔子一行人被围困在陈蔡之间已经七天没有吃热食了。

sentences.english: Zhai, the professor quoted by Xinhua, said he knows Wang and Cai's paper.
sentences.chinese: 新华社援引翟教授说法，他知道王和蔡的文章。

sentences.english: Further evidence was today taken from Jockey A Delpech, rider of SPARE A DIME, and from Mr J Size, trainer of the horse.
sentences.chinese: 的骑师杜鹏志及练马师蔡约翰今日均进一步作出证供。

sentences.english: James Tsai is the sort of MBA corporate recruiters covet.
sentences.chinese: 蔡建平是那种企业寻求的MBA人才。

sentences.english: Cai believes his team has discovered a master switch for the diseases caused by overeating .
sentences.chinese: 蔡认为他的团队已经发现了过食导致疾病的关键因素。

sentences.english: Fully savoring Tsai Ming-liang's He Liu (The River) requires patience.
sentences.chinese: 要充分品味蔡明亮的《河流》需要耐心。

sentences.english: It is very great honor to have Ms. Yan, Sijia's Chinese teacher, and Ms. Cai, Sijia's Maths teacher in the party.
sentences.chinese: 我们也有幸邀请来了思佳的语文颜老师和数学蔡老师。

sentences.english: No matter how many people tried to lever its mouth open, it held onto Cai's arm.
sentences.chinese: 不管人们怎么撬，狗还是紧紧地咬在蔡的臂上。

sentences.english: Cai lotus says, the whole case Sihong police took control of Sun Yingkai.
sentences.chinese: 蔡红莲说，整起案件泗洪警方只控制了孙迎凯一人。

sentences.english: I wish Chua’s children as much and more.
sentences.chinese: 我希望蔡教授的孩子们获得的会更多。

sentences.english: All of which Chua’s two daughters experienced.
sentences.chinese: 这也正是蔡教授两个女儿所经历的。

sentences.english: Cheng turns sad, Tsai opens the door, G enters.
sentences.chinese: 郑立刻作悲伤状，蔡开门，朱进来。

sentences.english: One week later, Tsai and Cheng playing with a new laptop computer.
sentences.chinese: 一周以后，蔡和郑在玩新的笔记本电脑。

sentences.english: Tsai believes she will win that right.
sentences.chinese: 蔡英文相信她会赢得这项权利。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
